abstract: New York Red Bulls defeat New York City Football Club, 4-1.
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls built a three-goal lead by halftime and never looked back, defeating N.Y.C.F.C., 4-1. Bradley Wright-Phillips scored twice.

headline.main: Red Bulls Swiftly Avenge Their First Loss to N.Y.C.F.C.
headline.print_headline: Red Bulls Reclaim Control of Rivalry While Coaches Feud in the Background

snippet: The Red Bulls built a three-goal lead by halftime and never looked back, defeating N.Y.C.F.C., 4-1. Bradley Wright-Phillips scored twice....
